segments.text: What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to have a roll developed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When do you need them , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . Do you want 3 x 5 or 4 x 6 ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The 4 x6 will be OK . Thanks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And do you want the glossy or matted finish ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You pay when you pick them up . I don't need a deposit for just one roll of film .
segments.speaker: S1
